derivation: or אֶשְׁתְּמוֹעַ; or אֶשְׁתְּמֹה; from H8085 (שָׁמַע) (in the sense of obedience);
outline:
Eshtemoa = "I will make myself heard"Eshtemoh = "I shall cause my own ruin: fire of astonishment: I shall soar aloft"
  1. a Levitical city in Judah
  2. a man of Judah
strongs_def: Eshtemoa or Eshtemoh, a place in Palestine
